attributes.additional_details:
£150,000 per annum should be the maximum ceiling wage anybody working in a public sector job should be paid.
This should include everyone connected to local or county councils, civil servants, politicians i.e. everyone paid from taxpayers' contributions.
All present and future job contracts to be re-evaluated within the limit of £150,000 per annum.
With a minimum, externally verified, working week of 40 hours X 48 weeks per annum or externally verified 1,920 hours per annum.
There is already a minimum wage, therefore the government should enforce by law this maximum wage.
